appName: Xtadium Immersive Sports Streaming in VR
displayName: Xtadium Immersive Sports Streaming in VR
display_name: Xtadium Immersive Sports Streaming in VR
display_long_description:
**Xtadium – Immersive Sports Streaming in VR & MR**

Experience sports like never before with **Xtadium**, the free VR & MR app that puts you front row for the world’s biggest events. Watch **NBA, UFC, PSG, X Games, NHL, WNBA**, and more in stunning **180º and 360º video** — live and on-demand.

[media]

Powered by **YBVR** and featured as one of Meta’s top Mixed Reality apps, Xtadium transforms your **Meta Quest 2, Quest 3, or Quest Pro** into the ultimate sports arena. Switch between **multiple camera angles**, check **real-time stats**, and host **Watch Parties** with friends, all from your living room.

**Top Experiences:**

[media]

🏀 **NBA Courtside** – Free immersive games + multi-game MR mode for League Pass.

🥊 **UFC & ONE Championship** – Step into the ring with exclusive fight coverage.

⚽ **PSG: Champions Season** – Matches and behind-the-scenes training.

🏒 **NHL, WNBA** – Iconic competitions in VR & MR.

🛹 **X Games** – Skate, BMX, skiing, snowboarding in high adrenaline 180º/360º.

**Tech Features:**

- VR & MR modes with up to 8K resolution
- Multi-camera switching during events
- Hand tracking for controller-free navigation
- Social media multitasking
- In-event overlays and leaderboards

[media]

**Download Xtadium free** and turn every match, fight, or race into an immersive event. Your living room is now the best seat in the house.

https://xtadiumvr.com | @XtadiumVR
